ygData.subject: Ouch...way hard

ygData.messageBody:
Let me tell you about my story last night

With the recipe in hand I gleefully trekked back to ak'anon and proceed to
spend 150pp making all the fishing poles I could. Then I gated back to
South Karana's and began hawking my wares. Sold quite a few and then one
person came up to me asking for spyglass. I said sure <had that recipe
also> and so she teleported me to Butcherblock and away I went.

10 tries, 4 successes, 2 skill point increases. 150pp gone

Ouch. I really need to get a wisdom suit. Failures hurt way bad.

But I get more requests for spyglasses than fishing poles. Sold em for 75pp
each. Everyone happy.
